abstract: The investor Len Blavatnik is fighting in court to get back some of the money he lost because of what he calls bank negligence.
snippet: The investor Len Blavatnik is fighting in court to get back some of the money he lost because of what he calls bank negligence.
lead_paragraph: A few weeks ago, I was pitched a seemingly irresistible story about an investor who had been wronged by JPMorgan Chase during the financial crisis. The investor, Len Blavatnik, was now fighting in court to get back some of the money he had lost because of the bank’s alleged negligence.

headline.main: A Billionaire Army of One vs. a Bank
headline.print_headline: A Billionaire Army of One Vs. a Bank
